text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1992. ==Events== *8 March - Morgane is selected to represent Belgium at the 1992 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Nous, on veut des violons". She is selected to be the thirty-seventh Belgian Eurovision entry during Eurosong held at the RTBF Studios in Brussels. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1980s=== *VTM Soundmixshow (1989-1995, 1997-) ===1990s=== *Samson en Gert (1990–present) *Familie (1991–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths==
title: 1992 in Belgian television
